title: Kirk Franklin, Jussie Smollett, Oscars and more.
itunes:title: Kirk Franklin, Jussie Smollett, Oscars and more.
description:
Happy Friday!  The show is in full effect and there is presidential talk as we open.  Kirk Franklin stops by the show to promote his new single Love Theory.  The Chicago Police Department Superintendent makes a statement regarding the Jussie Smollett case.  Cardi B. shows her support for Khloe Kardashian.  As we talk about the Oscars, the crew share with us their favorite movies and there are reenactments.  Today in Closing Remarks, Steve explains to us why other people's opinions of us don't matter and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
